byline.contributor: Ian Austen contributed reporting from Ottawa.

abstract: Rev Lim Hyeon-soo, pastor of Korean church in suburban Toronto, is reportedly being held by North Korean government after he failed to return from humanitarian mission there.
lead_paragraph: The chief pastor from a Korean church in Toronto had failed to return home from a humanitarian mission to the North.

headline.main: North Korea May Have a Missionary in Custody
headline.print_headline: North Korea May Have a Missionary in Custody

snippet: The chief pastor from a Korean church in Toronto had failed to return home from a humanitarian mission to the North.
